The position of the mekugi ana and its shape are not of Japanese origins. I don't 
need to read more books. As a member of the NTHK's shinsa team here in Tokyo 
and a director of the NTHK, I would say that I am in a bit better position to know. If 
that sword were submitted for shinsa, it would fail as not being Japanese.

Gordon
